ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank members of VBID-RUBAE, Lontsi Michel, Ngnidji Yannick, Magatsing Ornella, Defo Talom, Ouaba Jos√©, Djojo-Tachegoum Carelle for their assistance in the field. We are also grateful to villagers who allowed us to conduct this study in their villages, mainly the heads of the Toutsang, Fonakeukeu and Dschang communities in the Menoua Division.
